snippet.title: Parkasaurus : Exhibit Pane Reveal
snippet.description:
A first glimpse at the Exhibit Pane - an important aspect to designing your exhibits to maximize your dinosaurs' happiness. Each dino species has different wants and desires for their exhibits. How creative can you be? Very!

###

Want to be a Parkasaurus Warrior and help us out? Amazing!
Spread the word! Retweet us, Wishlist us, follow us, tell your friends about us :)

Steam Page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/591460/Parkasaurus
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WashBearStudio
Webpage: http://www.parkasaurusgame.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Washbearstudio
